hero.title: DeepChat - Your AI Partner on Desktop
hero.subtitle: Fast, focused, and designed for deep work. DeepChat brings the power of AI to your desktop with privacy and efficiency, making it your ideal companion for productive work.
features: Lightning-Fast Response - Native app performance for seamless interaction
Deep Work Focus - Designed for productive, distraction-free work environment
Privacy First - Local processing and secure data handling

modelProviders.subtitle: DeepChat is compatible with all major AI model providers
modelProviders.compatibleText: Compatible with any model provider in openai/gemini API format

enterprise.description: Combine internal financial data with real-time market information to generate comprehensive market analysis reports and trend forecasts.

enterprise.title: Regulatory Compliance Review
enterprise.description: Smart comparison between internal policy documents and the latest online regulations to identify potential compliance risks.

enterprise.title: Intelligent Market Intelligence
enterprise.description: Integrate internal competitive intelligence with online latest developments to provide comprehensive market insights and opportunity identification.

enterprise.title: Multi-source Data Reports
enterprise.description: Combine internal operational data with external market indicators to automatically generate periodic comprehensive reports and personalized dashboards.

cards.title: Web Search Integration
cards.description: Access real-time information with integrated web search capabilities and customizable search engines including academic search support.

cards.title: Document Processing
cards.description: Upload and process multiple documents simultaneously with intelligent analysis, extraction, and translation capabilities.

cards.title: MCP Integration
cards.description: Leverage Model Control Protocol for seamless integration with various AI models and expanded capabilities.

cards.title: Multi-Model Support
cards.description: Support for multiple AI models including GPT, Claude, DeepSeek, and more, with automatic model selection based on task requirements.

offline.title: Completely Local
offline.description: All conversations and data processing happen on your device, ensuring absolute privacy.

encrypted.title: Strict Protection
encrypted.description: Advanced encryption technology keeps every piece of your information safe and secure.

control.title: Full Autonomy
control.description: You have complete control over your data usage and storage, ensuring peace of mind.

creative.title: Creative Work

research.title: Research & Analysis
research.description: Dive deeper into data and knowledge with powerful AI tools

documentProcessing.title: Document Processing
documentProcessing.description: Automatically extract, summarize and organize information from various document formats
features: Extract key information from PDFs, Word documents and presentations
Generate concise summaries of lengthy documents
Convert unstructured data into structured formats
documentProcessing.caseSample: A marketing manager needs to review 20 customer feedback reports. DeepChat quickly extracts the key sentiment and suggestions from each report, saving hours of manual reading.

meetingAssistant.title: Meeting Assistant
meetingAssistant.description: Get more out of your meetings with AI-powered assistance
features: Generate meeting agendas based on previous discussions
Transcribe and summarize meeting content in real-time
Create action item lists with assigned responsibilities
Follow up on pending items from previous meetings
meetingAssistant.caseSample: During a project planning meeting, DeepChat transcribes the discussion and automatically creates a list of action items with deadlines, which is sent to all participants.

contentCreation.title: Content Creation
contentCreation.description: Create compelling content with AI-powered suggestions and enhancements
features: Generate outlines for articles, reports, and presentations
Suggest improvements for clarity, engagement, and tone
Create variations of content for different audiences
Assist with grammar, style, and formatting
contentCreation.caseSample: A content writer drafting blog posts uses DeepChat to generate multiple headline options and suggest structural improvements for better engagement.

learningEducation.title: Learning & Education
learningEducation.description: Accelerate learning and education with personalized AI assistance
features: Suggest learning paths based on interests and goals
learningEducation.caseSample: A teacher uses DeepChat to create customized practice problems for students with different learning needs, adapting the difficulty level for each student.

dataAnalysis.title: Data Analysis
dataAnalysis.description: Uncover insights from your data with powerful AI analysis tools
features: Analyze datasets to identify patterns and trends
Suggest statistical approaches for different data types
Explain data findings in simple language
dataAnalysis.caseSample: A business analyst uploads sales data to DeepChat, which quickly identifies seasonal trends and customer segments that weren't previously apparent.

marketResearch.title: Market Research
marketResearch.description: Stay ahead of market trends with AI-powered research assistance
features: Aggregate and analyze industry reports and news
Identify emerging trends and competitive movements
Summarize market conditions for different regions
marketResearch.caseSample: A product manager uses DeepChat to analyze recent industry developments, helping to identify a market gap that leads to a successful new product feature.

projectManagement.title: Project Management
projectManagement.description: Keep projects on track with intelligent project management assistance
features: Track progress and flag potential delays
projectManagement.caseSample: A project manager uses DeepChat to analyze the current project status, identify potential bottlenecks, and suggest task redistributions to meet the deadline.

teamCommunication.title: Team Communication
teamCommunication.description: Enhance team communication with AI-powered assistance
features: Summarize lengthy email threads and discussions
teamCommunication.caseSample: A multinational team uses DeepChat to facilitate communication between members speaking different languages, providing real-time translation during virtual meetings.

cta.title: Ready to enhance your productivity?
cta.description: Download DeepChat today and experience the power of AI in your daily work.
